overlayTitle.description: Title of the overlay modal dialog.

overlayParagraph1.message: The time has ellapsed for this wonderful site. We know you want to check out what is happening. But we would like to nudge you towards something more meaningful.
overlayParagraph1.description: First paragraph of the overlay modal dialog.

overlayParagraph2.message: Might we suggest a little Pocket App reading instead?
overlayParagraph2.description: Second paragraph of the overlay modal dialog.
